title: Stage Lv4-A2-S06
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: This graph shows a steady upward trend. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Sales have increased by 20%. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이 그래프는 지속적인 상승 추세를 보여줍니다. (v1)
sentences.en: This graph shows a steady upward trend. (variant 1)
There's been significant improvement compared to last year. (variant 1)
Let's look at the figures in detail. (variant 1)
Market share has dropped dramatically. (variant 1)
What this data shows is clear. (variant 1)
This shows the change from peak to lowest point. (variant 1)
We're growing at an average of 10% per month. (variant 1)
The results exceed our expectations. (variant 1)
The outlook for next quarter is positive. (variant 1)
Sales have increased by 20%. (variant 2)

sentences.kr: 이 그래프는 지속적인 상승 추세를 보여줍니다. (v2)
